attributes.action: Give deployed forces personnel more time to talk to their families  deployed forces personnel more time to talk to their families who are left behind.
attributes.additional_details: One 30 minute call a week for deployed personnel to their forces families is not enough! Our forces are deployed to far flung places at a very small or no financial benefit to themselves and their families and are given one phone card a week which lasts just 30 minutes to keep in contact with their families.  This is not acceptable, we must get as many signatures as possible to show our local MPs and our PM that we will not accept just 30 minutes and it must increase to help families deal with the separation from their families and children.
